items.title: yetzt/node-phn: a lightweight http client

items.content_html: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.
items.title: Alwatr/nitrobase: Nitrobase is a blazingly fast, lightweight database built on JSON. It stores data entirely in memory for lightning-quick access, while also providing a JSON file backup for persistence. You can easily serve your data over the web using our high-performance accelerated Nginx server.

items.content_html: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.
items.title: TAGCH/Workflow-Automation: A lightweight, web-based automation tool designed to simplify repetitive tasks for small teams and individuals. It focuses on ease of use, offering essential features like API integration, simple workflows, and execution monitoring without the complexity or high cost of other solutions.

items.content_html: An API for Generating Cat Pictures provides users with access to random cat images through simple HTTP requests. It’s a fun and lightweight API, often used for building creative projects or as placeholders in web development. The API responds with a URL of a random cat picture, and it’s typically used in projects to display random images
items.title: TanishqChavan10/API-testing: An API for Generating Cat Pictures provides users with access to random cat images through simple HTTP requests. items.content_html: KaliPHP is a fast, lightweight PHP framework. In an age where frameworks are a dime a dozen, We believe that KaliPHP will stand out in the crowd. It will do this by combining all the things you love about the great frameworks out there, while getting rid of the bad.

items.content_html: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.
items.title: AndreyMork/domistrukt: A lightweight TypeScript library that simplifies the creation of structured data objects. It offers a type-safe and flexible API for defining and initializing classes with custom properties and behaviors, making it easier to manage complex data structures in TypeScript projects.
